attributes.action: Provide the same level and extent of legal protection to the elderly in care, as that provided for children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent "Panorama" programme highlighted the lack of legal protection for the elderly in care, the abysmal services offered by some care homes, and the total lack of support by the regulator in controlling quality standards in care establishments.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
